title: Dan Patrick - Hour 2 – NBA Insider Frank Isola
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 2 – NBA Insider Frank Isola
description:
In hour two of The Dan Patrick Show, Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre put a spotlight on Kyrie Irving’s mindset. The conversation shifts to athletes and social media. We hear some sound from Colin Kaepernick’s appearance on the “I Am Athlete” podcast, and the guys discuss the probability on the quarterback’s return to the filed. Plus, NBA insider Frank Isola joins the show to discuss Kyrie Irving’s antics in Boston, NBA playoffs, and more!

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
